content:
The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the loss of Russians in the last day, as well as their total losses since the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

The data was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 22.

The losses of Russians are:

  • personnel - 434 710 (+870) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6840 (+8)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13 111 (+37)
  • artillery systems - 10 775 (+35)
  • RSWW - 1018 (0)
  • air defense facilities - 723 (+2)
  • aircraft - 347 (0)
  • helicopters - 325 (0)
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8388 (+23)
  • Winged missiles - 1953 (+31)
  • ships / boats - 26 (0)
  • submarines - 1 (0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14 287 (+45)
  • Special equipment - 1749 (+8).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!
title: The enemy lost 35 artistem and 37 armored vehicles per day, 870 invaders were eliminated - the General Staff of the Armed Forces
description: The data was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 22. The losses of Russians are: ...
author: Army Inform
